name: LittleBigPlanet 2: DC Comics Premium Level Pack
name_original: LittleBigPlanet 2: DC Comics Premium Level Pack
description:
LittleBigPlanet 2: DC Comics Premium Level Pack is an arcade game developed by Media Molecule. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
LittleBigPlanet 2: DC Comics Premium Level Pack is available on PlayStation 3.
